div.p: This resource is an leaf-node observation of a a BiRad Assessment Category. It is referenced by an parent Observation section that references other information about this specific abnormality Observation.value[x] is a single codeableConcept, and is bound to one of the following values

ul.li: Category-4A - Category 4A - Low suspicion for malignancy
Category-4B - Category 4B - Moderate suspicion for malignancy
Category-4C - Category 4C - High suspicion for malignancy
Category-5 - Category 5 - Highly Suggestive of Malignancy
